verbose_text: Studies have shown that whereas colonic adenomas maintain their continuous laminin-332 expression, the transition to a carcinoma and metastatic lesion is associated with discontinuous expression of laminin-332 and even an abnormal expression of the beta3 and gamma2 subunits in the cytoplasm of a subset of carcinoma cells [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
